mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Weaver, Merchant
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Weaver, Merchant Patient Age: 19. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture distal phalanx middle finger left hand. Amputated at 1 joint 1864/07/24 by D. Skilling A.A.Surgeon US Genl Hospital Clarysville. Location Wounded: Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/07/20. Result: Cured and returned to duty.
